summary: REQ-18 and REQ-20 appear implemented via a new Landing-page marketing section with app store badge links (correct URLs, target=_blank, rel=noopener noreferrer) and English external-destination copy with a disclaimer. REQ-19 is not evidenced because the required media-kit images are referenced but not shown as added under frontend/public/ in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Download and add UnityNodes media-kit logo assets from https://unitynodes.io/media-kit.html into the frontend as static public assets (frontend/public/...) and render at least one of them in a public-facing section; do not serve via backend.
missing_requirements.reason: The new UI references logo/badge images at /assets/generated/... but the diff summary shows no added image files under frontend/public/... (only a TSX component was added). Without the actual image assets added to the repo, the AC for adding/downloading media-kit assets as public static files is not met based on provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer copy/branding adjustments unrelated to the app-download links or media-kit logos.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add app-download links/section and incorporate media-kit logos; changes described to the footer are not requested in REQ-18/19/20.
